communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) Pass rates on the state cosmetology licensing exam, broken down by school, between 1/1/2023 to the present

2) Copies of all complaints, from 1/1/2022 through present, regarding the following institutions, inclusive of any and all their campuses:

Tennessee School of Beauty of Knoxville Inc
Paul Mitchell the School
Empire Beauty School
Gould's Academy
TC Beauty
Austin's Beauty College Inc
Genesis Career College-Lebanon
The Hair Academy LLC
Franklin Hair Academy School of Cosmetology
Sandra Academy of Salon Services


If the complaints are too numerous by page and would require a cost estimate, please send me a spreadsheet of the complaints, which includes the complaint information, without the attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Meredith Kolodner
